content: 13 single_crochet or chain 3 and turn chain 2 and turn 64 2 dctog in the next two stitches double_crochet into double_crochet into the last stitch 9 stitches chain 1 and the next stitch 1 double_crochet into each of the next 7 turn stitches and 2 dctog in the following 2 stitches 67 single_crochet into each stitch all the way across 9 single_crochet and 1 double_crochet into the last remaining stitch 11 double_crochet chain 2 and turn chain 1 and turn 68 1 double_crochet into each stitch all the way across 9 2 dctog means 2 double crochets together double_crochet chain 1 and turn yo once insert hook into indicated stitch pull up a loop insert hook into the next 69 single_crochet into each stitch all the way across 9 single_crochet stitch pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook and tie off yo and pull through first 3 loops yo and pull through remaining 2 loops on hook weave in the tails and trim 65 single_crochet into each stitch all the way across 11 single_crochet sew a button on the end of the double_crochet not the chain 2 and turn treble so that the ear warmer is adjustable 66 2 dctog the next two stitches double_crochet into the next 5 stitches and 2 dctog in the next stitch 1 it s adjustable picture tutorial be sure to read the *note above in the written portion of this pattern under special stitches before beginning last sew your favorite button on the end with the double_crochet so that your button can fit between the treble_crochet of the other end and voila keep warm contact www facebook com/wholelottaknotting/
